body_html:
I also experienced this issue. This happens when conducting massive inference. Below is an example showing what I did. A process that takes 79Mb GPU mem would be created periodically.

model = torchvision.models.resnet50()
model = torch.nn.DataParallel(model)
model.cuda()
model.eval()
result = []
for input in dataloader:
    output = model(input)
    result.append(output.data.cpu().numpy())

body:
I also experienced this issue. This happens when conducting massive inference. Below is an example showing what I did. A process that takes 79Mb GPU mem would be created periodically. 
```
model = torchvision.models.resnet50()
model = torch.nn.DataParallel(model)
model.cuda()
model.eval()
result = []
for input in dataloader:
    output = model(input)
    result.append(output.data.cpu().numpy())
```
